titleStmt.title: Read, try, judge, and speak as you find. At the Black Ball and Old Lillys Head, next door to the Feather shops that are within Black-Friers Gate-way, which is over against Ludgate Church, just by Ludgate in London (through God's mercy to do good) still liveth Thomas Saffold, an approved and licensed physician and student in astrology ...
titleStmt.author: Saffold, Thomas, 1640-1691.

titleStmt.title: Read, try, judge, and speak as you find. At the Black Ball and Old Lillys Head, next door to the Feather shops that are within Black-Friers Gate-way, which is over against Ludgate Church, just by Ludgate in London (through God's mercy to do good) still liveth Thomas Saffold, an approved and licensed physician and student in astrology ...
titleStmt.author: Saffold, Thomas, 1640-1691.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
"For the publick good by Mrs. Elizab. Archer, who keeps a Turners Shop in Church-Street, near the church at Greenwich in Kent ..."
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library
Advertisements for the services of Dr. Thomas Saffold.
